statements: SELECT service_id, service_name, slice_type, resource_allocation FROM network_slicing;
SELECT service_name, slice_type, resource_allocation, service_id FROM network_slicing;
SELECT * FROM network_slicing WHERE service_id = 1;
SELECT service_name, resource_allocation FROM network_slicing WHERE slice_type = 'Private';
SELECT service_id, slice_type FROM network_slicing ORDER BY resource_allocation DESC;
SELECT service_name, slice_type FROM network_slicing WHERE resource_allocation > 100 ORDER BY service_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_slicing WHERE slice_type = 'High' ORDER BY service_name;
SELECT service_name, slice_type, resource_allocation FROM network_slicing WHERE service_id = 3;
SELECT service_name, slice_type, resource_allocation FROM network_slicing WHERE resource_allocation BETWEEN 50 AND 150 ORDER BY resource_allocation ASC;
SELECT service_id, slice_type, resource_allocation FROM network_slicing WHERE service_name LIKE '%Slicing%' ORDER BY service_id;
SELECT * FROM network_slices;
SELECT slice_id, slice_name, service_type FROM network_slices WHERE service_type = 'Data';
SELECT slice_id, slice_name, resource_limit FROM network_slices WHERE resource_limit > 100;
SELECT * FROM service_resources;
SELECT slice_id, resource_type, allocated_resource FROM service_resources WHERE resource_type = 'CPU';
SELECT * FROM network_slices WHERE service_type = 'Data' ORDER BY slice_id ASC
SELECT slice_name, service_type FROM network_slices WHERE resource_limit > 100 ORDER BY resource_limit DESC
SELECT slice_name, allocated_resource FROM network_slices JOIN service_resources ON network_slices.slice_id = service_resources.slice_id WHERE service_type = 'Voice' ORDER BY allocated_resource ASC
SELECT * FROM service_resources WHERE resource_type = 'Storage' ORDER BY resource_id DESC
SELECT slice_id, slice_name, resource_limit FROM network_slices WHERE slice_name LIKE 'ABC%' ORDER BY slice_id
SELECT * FROM network_slicing_resources;
SELECT service_name, resource_type FROM network_slicing_resources;
SELECT * FROM service_requirements WHERE priority_level = 1;
SELECT service_name, required_resources FROM service_requirements ORDER BY required_resources DESC;

SELECT s.service_name, r.resource_type, ra.allocated_capacity FROM network_slicing_resources r, service_requirements s, resource_allocation ra WHERE ra.resource_id = r.resource_id AND ra.service_id = s.service_id;
SELECT * FROM network_slicing_resources WHERE resource_capacity > 100 ORDER BY resource_id DESC;
SELECT service_name, resource_capacity FROM network_slicing_resources ORDER BY resource_capacity DESC, service_name ASC;
SELECT r.resource_id, r.service_name, ra.allocated_capacity FROM network_slicing_resources r JOIN resource_allocation ra ON r.resource_id = ra.resource_id WHERE ra.allocated_capacity > 50;
SELECT sr.service_name, sr.required_resources, ra.allocated_capacity FROM resource_allocation ra JOIN service_requirements sr ON ra.service_id = sr.service_id WHERE sr.priority_level = 1;

SELECT rs.service_name, MAX(ra.allocated_capacity) AS max_allocated_capacity FROM network_slicing_resources rs JOIN resource_allocation ra ON rs.resource_id = ra.resource_id GROUP BY rs.service_name ORDER BY max_allocated_capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_slice;
SELECT slice_name, service_type FROM network_slice WHERE slice_id = 1;
SELECT service_name FROM service_mapping WHERE slice_id = 3 ORDER BY service_name ASC;
SELECT allocation_id, resource_type, allocated_amount FROM resource_allocation WHERE allocated_amount > 100;
SELECT user_id, subscription_date, expiration_date FROM user_subscription WHERE subscription_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM network_slice;
SELECT service_type, slice_name FROM network_slice;
SELECT service_name, slice_id FROM service_mapping WHERE service_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, subscription_date FROM user_subscription WHERE slice_id = 5;
SELECT service_name, slice_name FROM service_mapping INNER JOIN network_slice ON service_mapping.slice_id = network_slice.slice_id;
SELECT * FROM network_slicing_services;
SELECT service_name, resource_allocation FROM network_slicing_services;
SELECT * FROM 5g_subscribers WHERE subscriber_name = 'Alice';
SELECT slice_name, service_id FROM network_slices ORDER BY slice_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT service_id FROM 5g_subscribers;
SELECT * FROM network_slicing_services;
SELECT service_name, resource_allocation FROM network_slicing_services WHERE resource_allocation > 500;
SELECT * FROM 5g_subscribers JOIN network_slicing_services ON 5g_subscribers.service_id = network_slicing_services.service_id;
SELECT slice_name, resource_type, resource_amount FROM network_slices JOIN resource_usage ON network_slices.slice_id = resource_usage.slice_id WHERE resource_amount < 100;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM slice_policies WHERE policy_id = 'ec793e50-1ba3-11ec-9621-0242ac130002';
